title: Complexity Science Hub * Dirk Helbing
snippet: Dirk Helbing is Professor of Computational Social Science at the Department of Humanities, Social and Political Sciences and associated at ETH Zurich’s Department of Computer Science. His current studies discuss the digital society, smart cities, as well as challenges and opportunities of ...

snippet: Oct 2025 · Dirk Helbing · This review article reflects on emerging societies using a data-driven, cybernetic governance approach. Such an approach implies great opportunities, but also considerable challenges and potential ethical issues, ...

title: Dirk Helbing - Wikipedia
snippet: Helbing received an honorary PhD from Delft University of Technology (TU Delft). Since June 2015 he was affiliate professor at the faculty of Technology, Policy and Management at TU Delft for some years, where he led the PhD school in "Engineering Social Technologies for a Responsible Digital Future". Dirk Helbing started out as a physicist.
